item.title: argparse is cool
item.description: argparse is cool I need to copy files between S3 buckets on a regular basis for my job. The aws command line tool is great but I forget flags often…and usually the same ones over and over. What if I made a custom version of aws s3 cp that was simpler and fit the majority of my copy usecases? Well, here it is in 43 lines (with proper spacing) using argparse:
